message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $12,000. I know it's valuable to you, and I believe this price reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my original price reflects the true value of this item.  I can come down slightly to $11,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
